entry.title: Resources to cope with physical distancing

link.title: Resources to cope with physical distancing

entry.content:
Hey there,

A few days ago, I started compiling a list of things to do to cope with this time of physical distancing. Hopefully, it will be useful to you as it has been to me!

This also marks the creation of this site. I’ll slowly add reports from my past projects and maybe a list of escape rooms recommandations… we’ll see!

Cheers

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pL24u-0C9Dd8cjzZxt_cQx9vN9QAyhE1OPL766EjSyk/edit
